title: Holly Willoughby's BRIT Awards style: Get the Look
text:
VIDEOS Holly Willoughby's BRIT Awards style: Get the Look The This Morning presenter wowed on the BRIT Awards red carpet. See how you can recreate her look on the high street 23 February 2017 Celebrity Style 
Holly Willoughby dazzled on the red carpet at the BRIT Awards on Wednesday evening, wearing a shimmering pewter sequin dress. The This Morning presenter didn't let the traffic en route to the event stop her from making an entrance at the iconic awards ceremony, showcasing an on trend head-to-toe metallic ensemble. 
GALLERY: All the BRITs 2017 red carpet outfits 
Proving that sequins can still be worn beyond party season, Holly wowed in a bespoke long-sleeved mini dress from Suzanne Neville. The mum-of-three styled the dress with silver barely there heels from Casadei and a co-ordinating Giuseppe Zanotti clutch bag. Delicate earrings from Apples & Figs jewellery completed the show-stopping look. CLICK TO VIEW GALLERY Holly Willoughby looked gorgeous in a Suzanne Neville dress and Casadei heels 
While Holly's exact dress isn't available to buy, there are a number of affordable alternatives on the high street should you wish to recreate her look. Read on to see how you can channel Holly's BRIT Awards style for less… 
GALLERY: The best behind-the-scenes Instagram photos from the BRIT Awards 
This long-sleeved sequin dress from Oh My Love at Topshop is a glitzy alternative to Holly's bespoke design. And currently reduced to £34 from its original price of £68, it's an affordable addition to your going out look. Holly's Casadei Techno Blade cost £670, but for a more purse-friendly option, we think these £40 River Island silver sandals are a great fit. More is more when it comes to this look, so accessorise with this embellished boxy clutch bag from Carvela Kurt Geiger – a great substitute for Holly's Giuseppe Zanotti clutch – and Swarovski Harley Cuff earrings (£49). Recreate Holly's look with these high street buys 
Celebrity hairstylist Carl Bembridge also explained to HELLO! how to recreate Holly's sleek and glossy BRITs hairdo . "I loved Holly's look; it was so different to her usual style but she looked so glamorous and so sharp with her sleek, slicked-back hair and glitzy sequin dress," Carl said, before giving his step-by-step tips on how to recreate her look.
